thread.title: Top EU court says U.S.-EU data transfer deal is invalid
thread.title_full: Top EU court says U.S.-EU data transfer deal is invalid

author: Expert
title: Top EU court says U.S.-EU data transfer deal is invalid
text:
Technology , Topnews technologyNews Expert 
BRUSSELS/LUXEMBOURG (Reuters) â€“ A system enabling data transfers from the European Union to the United States by thousands of companies is invalid, the highest European Union court said on Tuesday in a landmark ruling that will leave firms scrambling to find alternative measures.
